text: Hello all—attempting to use a module so a client can set their own background image—unfortunately, doesn't seem to work as expected. Instead of using the variable it simple shows up as blank (as in `background: url()`). Help is much appreciated!

A warning usually shows up in modules to tell you "HubL in your CSS or JavaScript won't be parsed". You would need to move the CSS into your HTML section either as a <style> block or inline. Also, you'll want to use {{ module.background_image.src }} to render the src url of the image.
Is there a way to embed Google Reviews on a HubSpot page?

You can also just put `{{ module.attention_getter }}`

Don't need all that other mumbo jumbo, thats what adds the wrapper
I tried to fetch GMB reviews once in past but not succeed. hope someone else can help so i can learn something also :slightly_smiling_face:
